parameters.name: FileName
parameters.description: Path and file name of the file to which to save the points; you can specify .sldcrv files or .txt as the filename extension

title: IFreePointCurveFeatureData.SavePointsToFile
description: Saves the points for this free-point curve to a file.

parameters.name: FileName
parameters.description: Path and file name of the file to which to save the points; you can specify .sldcrv files or .txt as the filename extension

returns: True if the points are saved to the file, false if not
remarks:
Exported units, e.g., meters, of the document that owns the feature, and not necessarily those of the active document, are used when data is saved to a file.
See SOLIDWORKS Help for details about free-point curve files.
